oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb al-ʻIqd al-jawhar al-thamīn fī arbaʻīn ḥadīthan min aḥādīth Sayyid al-Mursalīn / taʼlīf Khātimat al-muḥaddithīn al-Shaykh Ismāʻīl al-ʻAjlūnī al-Jarrāḥī manuscript, 1900
ʻIqd al-jawhar al-thamīn fī arbaʻīn ḥadīthan min aḥādīth Sayyid al-Mursalīn
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ʻAjlūnī, Ismāʻīl ibn Muḥammad , 1676 or 1677-1748 or 1749
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy completed on 22 Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1317 [March 24, 1900] in the hand of Aḥmad Fahmī al-ʻAṭṭār al-Dimashqī al-Shāfiʻī "naqlan ʻan nuskhat al-Kuzbarī al-Kabīr."
In a note at the end, the copyist says that he read the entire text to his uncle Bakrī al-ʻAṭṭār, who gave him license to transmit this text, 1317 [1899].
Bound with: Kitāb al-Fawāʼid al-jalīlah fī musalsalāt Ibn ʻAqīlah / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ʻAqīlah.
MS Arab 112. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hadith
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: عجلوني، اسماعيل بن محمد، , 1676 or 1677-1748 or 1749
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: عقد الجوهر الثمين في اربعين حديثا من احاديث سيد المرسلين
كتاب عقد الجوهر الثمين في اربعين حديثا من احاديث سيد المرسلين : مخطوطة، 1900
